title: [Yegharren Plain, Veldt]
description: The grass buzzes with the vibrations of countless bees and flies and locusts, the sound a constant faint hum under the whistling of the eastern wind.  Rising from the level plain like a miniature mountain, the severed trunk of a long-dead tree provides shelter for a colony of ants and beetles.

The night buzzes with the vibrations of countless bees and flies and locusts, the sound a constant faint hum under the whistling of the eastern wind.  Rising from the level plain like a miniature mountain, the severed trunk of a long-dead tree provides shelter for a colony of ants and beetles.
